programme.title: Sonic Prime
programme.desc: It Takes One to No Place: Sonic lands in the deep seas of The No Place, where pirate versions of his friends are led by Knuckled the Dredd. (S1, ep 7)

programme.title: Danger Force
programme.desc: The Danger Force Awakens: Captain Man has a new crew of superhero sidekicks. But when he says there's a "crime drought" in Swellview, they suspect that he's fighting crime without them. (S1, ep 1)

programme.title: The Thundermans
programme.desc: Mall Time Crooks: Phoebe and Max turn a trip to the mall to pick up Hank's birthday gift into chaos, with a run-in with security that threatens to derail their dad's birthday. (S2, ep 9)

programme.title: The Thundermans
programme.desc: It's Not What You Link: Max and Link fight, so Phoebe helps them become friends. When Link starts spending more time with Max than her, Phoebe's plan may have worked too well. (S2, ep 21)

programme.title: Henry Danger
programme.desc: Invisible Brad: Captain Man's friend Brad, who years ago was accidentally turned invisible, shows up to visit but quickly overstays his welcome. (S1, ep 12)

programme.title: Henry Danger
programme.desc: Spoiler Alert: Henry and Ray must deal with an especially annoying new villain, the Spoiler. Piper is pushed to her limits as she tries to join a popular Captain Man fan club. (S1, ep 13)

programme.title: Hunter Street
programme.desc: Not Quite X Marks the Spot: Sal and Anika are left empty-handed and must find a different way to outwit their enemy. Back in the forest, Oliver decides to take matters into his own hands. (S3, ep 27)

programme.title: 44 Cats
programme.desc: A Cat-tastic Work Of Art!: Abdul convinces Granny Pina to sign a paper allowing Winston to bulldoze her house and build a giant shopping mall. (S2, ep 1)

programme.title: 44 Cats
programme.desc: Peppy's True Talent: Peppy wants to become a circus artist just like her uncles Milky and Choc. Despite several attempts, Peppy can't perform as she wants. The Buffycats are ready to help! (S2, ep 2)

programme.title: 44 Cats
programme.desc: Terry, The Firefighter Cat: Terry the pug, believing himself to be a cat, wants to become the firefighters' cat and does his very best in several situations to prove his bravery. (S2, ep 3)

programme.title: Best & Bester
programme.desc: Best and Bester find out what gives their favourite cereal such a purply taste in 'Tenta-Flakes', then in 'Boss Level', Bester's ideas to make mini golf fun nearly lead to disaster. (S1, ep 6)

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: Instead of paying to fix a hole in the wall, Mr. Krabs instead opens up a 'Drive-Thru', and in 'The Hot Shot', Tony Fast Jr., the son of a famous race car driver, teaches SpongeBob how to drive.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: SpongeBob and Patrick build a golf course indoors in 'A Friendly Game', and then in 'Sentimental Sponge', SpongeBob has trouble throwing things away due to the memories attached to his possessions.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: Smurfette and Blossom take Grouchy camping in 'Unsmurfable Smile', then in 'Mind the Cat', Gargamel falls under the mind control of Azrael and the Smurfs must help to set him free. (S1, ep 3)

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: Papa Smurf disappears in 'Where's Papa Smurf?', then in 'Who's Heftier?', Wimpy challenges Hefty to a test of strength and wins by accident! (S1, ep 4)

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: SpongeBob and Squidward try to sell krabby patties from a truck in the depths of the ocean in 'Food PBBFT! Truck', then in 'Upturn Girls', Pearl and Narlene have a whales' day out in the big city.

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show
programme.desc: Patrick loses the remote in the cushions, so journeys into the couch to find it in 'Lost in Couch', then in 'Pat-a-thon', Patrick hosts a telethon to raise money for snails who can't dance. (S1, ep 3)

programme.title: Sonic Prime
programme.desc: Barking Up the Wrong Tree: Sonic is shocked that the Boscage Maze "Monster" is Amy AKA Thorn Rose. Wielding a Paradox Prism shard, Thorn wages war on the tree-dwelling Scavengers. (S1, ep 5)

programme.title: The Thundermans
programme.desc: Looperheroes: The Z-Force gives Max and Phoebe a superhero day off, but when they relive the day over and over again, they must find a way to break the loop. (S4, ep 22)

programme.title: Henry Danger
programme.desc: Captain Man-kini: When a new internet celebrity is causing havoc in Swellview, Captain Man has to body swap with Frankini to infiltrate his secret lair. (S4, ep 20)

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: Painter finds a new subject to paint in 'Mommy's Masterpiece', then in 'A Thief Among Us!', the Smurfs' favourite things start disappearing all over the village. (S2, ep 4)

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: Ogre Love: Big Mouth falls in love with Smurfette after she pulls a splinter from his thumb. (S2, ep 5)

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: When SpongeBob hides the secret formula at home, Gary must protect it from Plankton in 'Pineapple Invasion', then in 'Salsa Imbecilicus', an accident causes everyone in town to become like Patrick.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: SpongeBob thinks he's allergic to his pineapple, so Squidward offers to help find him a new home in 'Unreal Estate', then in 'Code Yellow', Squidward is getting a nose job at the local hospital.

programme.title: The Loud House
programme.desc: Tripped!: Everyone in the family has been working hard to save up for a family vacation. But while road tripping to their destination, everything that can go for the family wrong does. (S3, ep 1)

programme.title: The Loud House
programme.desc: Lincoln has a plan for introducing himself to a new girl in 'White Hare', then in 'Insta-Gran', Pop Pop introduces his new girlfriend to the family. (S3, ep 2)

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show
programme.desc: Patrick hosts an award ceremony in 'The Starry Awards', and then in 'Blorpsgiving', Captain Doug Quasar meets Pat-Tron's robot family. (S1, ep 23)

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: SpongeBob volunteers to babysit 'Sandy's Nutty Nieces', then in 'Insecurity Guards', SpongeBob and Patrick volunteer as guards at the museum, while Squidward attempts to hang his painting unnoticed.

programme.title: The Thundermans
programme.desc: Parks & T-Rex: Preoccupied with Z-Force training, Phoebe & Max learn that they've forgotten special family events. Wanting to make it up, Phoebe plans a family fun day. (S4, ep 9)

programme.title: Henry Danger
programme.desc: Danger Games - Part 2: When Dr. Minyak plans to ruin Double G's concert, Captain Man and Kid Danger join forces with the Game Shakers to defeat Dr. Minyak and keep Double G safe. (S4, ep 2)

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: Rowena casts a spell on Voltaire in 'Dragon Pet', then in 'Ultimate Prank', the Smurfs are fed up with Jokey's pranks and decide to play him at his own game. (S3, ep 3)

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: Clumsy and Dimwitty want to help cure 'Rowena's Plant', then in 'What a Doll', Rowena decides to turn Vanity and Storm into dolls to play with. (S3, ep 4)

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show
programme.desc: In an episode about boats, Cecil teaches Patrick how to drive in 'Driven to Drive', then in 'A Patty in Time', Patrick time-travels in a race for the Krusty Krab's newest menu item. (S3, ep 5)

programme.title: The Loud House
programme.desc: The Louds gather ingredients for an italian chef in 'Nonna Your Business', and the road trip continues in 'Alpining Away', when Lynn crushes on a boy. (S8, ep 6)

programme.title: Sonic Prime
programme.desc: Situation - Grim: Sonic learns that Nine is using the New Yoke shard to create his dream world in a barren shatterspace called The Grim. Can Sonic convince Nine to fight with him? (S1, ep 6)

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: Mr Krabs resorts to desperate measures after Plankton drives away his customers in 'Free Samples', and then in 'Home Sweet Rubble', SpongeBob's pineapple is falling apart, and needs re-modelling.

programme.title: The Thundermans: Undercover
programme.desc: All About Steve: Billy hopes that his new sidekick Steve can join the T-Force. Phoebe and Max consider it, but soon discover that his superpower is making marshmallows. (S1, ep 10)

programme.title: Rock Island Mysteries
programme.desc: Lucky Charm: When Lila buys Nori a lucky charm bracelet at the Rock Island Flea Market, they soon realise that the bracelet is not what it seems. Meesha and Lila must figure out the secret. (S2, ep 7)

programme.title: Henry Danger
programme.desc: The Thumb Buddies: Captain Man and Kid Danger get jealous when a new crime-fighting team emerges in Swellview. Guest starring Jerry Trainor. (S4, ep 13)

programme.title: Henry Danger
programme.desc: Saturday Night Lies: When Ray runs into an ex-girlfriend, he tries to impress her by pretending that Henry, Charlotte, and Jasper are his children. (S4, ep 14)

programme.title: The Thundermans
programme.desc: Are You Afraid of the Park?: Max and Phoebe start a fight between Billy and Nora so they can avoid riding a roller coaster, but it all backfires when things get out of control. (S3, ep 5)

programme.title: The Thundermans
programme.desc: Evil Never Sleeps: Phoebe's allegiance is torn when she learns her boyfriend's father might be plotting a return to evil, and she must decide whether to take him down. (S3, ep 6)

programme.title: Danger Force
programme.desc: Wedding of the Trentury: Captain Man & Danger Force offer to host the wedding of the century for Swellview's beloved newscaster Trent Overunder and his internet girlfriend Tracy426. (S2, ep 24)

programme.title: Victorious
programme.desc: Tori Tortures Teacher: The kids take Sikowitz to see a play to celebrate his 10-year teaching anniversary, but the subject sends him into a funk. It's up to Tori to cheer him up. (S2, ep 6)

programme.title: Popularity Papers
programme.desc: Prides-Maids: When Julie invites her dad, James (aka Mapleview's favourite drag queen, Aurora Borealis) to perform at Pride week, the girls think they have popularity in the bag. (S1, ep 18)

programme.title: Henry Danger
programme.desc: Licence to Fly: Ray agrees to let Henry fly his helicopter, but it's too much for Ray when he starts to act like a nervous parent. Charlotte, Jasper, and Piper find a cotton candy machine. (S3, ep 15)

programme.title: Henry Danger
programme.desc: Swellview's Got Talent: After discovering contestants on Swellview's Got Talent are losing consciousness, Captain Man and Kid Danger find out what is causing the mischief. (S3, ep 16)

programme.title: The Thundermans
programme.desc: The Thundreth: Nearing their 100th save, Phoebe & Max are determined to make it their best one yet. But they overlook a super villain plotting revenge on his old rivals - Hank and Barb. (S4, ep 29)

programme.title: The Thundermans
programme.desc: Looperheroes: The Z-Force gives Max and Phoebe a superhero day off, but when they relive the day over and over again, they must find a way to break the loop. (S4, ep 22)

programme.title: Rock Island Mysteries
programme.desc: Something in the Water: The gang encounters an old friend of Uncle Charlie's whose been keeping himself young by drinking from a fountain of youth! Meesha accidentally becomes a baby, (S1, ep 3)

programme.title: Rock Island Mysteries
programme.desc: Who's That Girl?: The gang comes across a glamorous girl with a vintage spy camera and no memory. Is she a spy? With Raquel sniffing around, the team tries to help the mysterious girl. (S1, ep 4)

programme.title: Sonic Prime
programme.desc: There's no ARRGH in "Team": Sonic and the crew of the Angel's Voyage aren't the only ones after the No Place Shard. The Chaos Council co-opted Nine's Shatterdrive tech and want it back too! (S1, ep 8)

programme.title: Sonic Prime
programme.desc: There's no ARRGH in "Team": Sonic and the crew of the Angel's Voyage aren't the only ones after the No Place Shard. The Chaos Council co-opted Nine's Shatterdrive tech and want it back too! (S1, ep 8)

programme.title: Danger Force
programme.desc: Say My Name: The members of Danger Force are given terrible nicknames live on TV, so they come up with a plan to announce to the world who they really are. (S1, ep 3)

programme.title: The Thundermans
programme.desc: Cape Fear: Phoebe tries to get back in superhero training, but when she sneaks out to a party and saves someone's life, she asks Max to take the credit, and he becomes a hero. (S2, ep 22)

programme.title: The Thundermans
programme.desc: Call of Lunch Duty: Phoebe discovers that Max is behind the latest pranks at school, but when she refuses to give up his secret to the principal, she must face the consequences. (S2, ep 23)

programme.title: Henry Danger
programme.desc: Let's Make a Steal: Captain Man gets Henry a spot on his favourite game show in an attempt to investigate a string of robberies. But Henry soon finds himself a victim too! (S1, ep 14)

programme.title: Henry Danger
programme.desc: Super Volcano: Activity in a dormant super volcano under Swellview makes Henry and Ray think the world is ending. Piper is convinced she has a gluten intolerance. (S1, ep 15)

programme.title: Hunter Street
programme.desc: Tricky Times: With the eclipse rapidly approaching and the final riddle solved, the kids must put their heads together and figure out how to stop their enemy and get to the treasure first. (S3, ep 28)

programme.title: 44 Cats
programme.desc: A Very Special Girl!: Granny Pina is anxious and busy, because a very special guest is coming to visit: her granddaughter Isotta. The cats discover that young girl can talk to animals! (S2, ep 4)

programme.title: 44 Cats
programme.desc: The Mystery of the Ghost Cat: Word has spread out that there's a ghost cat in town. A presence may be haunting the neighbourhood! This is definitely a mystery the Buffycats want to solve. (S2, ep 5)

programme.title: 44 Cats
programme.desc: The Flying Treasure Hunt: Competitors must move without touching the ground to reach the final treasure. Meatball is happy to compete, but will he manage to prove he is a real flying cat? (S2, ep 6)

programme.title: Best & Bester
programme.desc: Best's sound effects threaten to derail Bester's one chance to shine in 'Stage Struck', then in 'Ball Count', a case of missing golf balls escalates into a full-on mountain rescue mission. (S1, ep 7)

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: When Patrick suddenly grows a beard, he decides it's time to act like a grown-up in 'Squidward's School For Grown-Ups', and then in 'Oral Report', SpongeBob must face his fear of public speaking.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: Plankton tries to befriend Squidward to steal the Krabby Patty formula in 'Sweet and Sour Squidward', and then in 'The Googly Artiste', Patrick's painted rocks with googly eyes are an artistic hit.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: Scaredy and Hefty disguise themselves as girls in 'Some Like It Not', then in 'Joke's on You', Vanity tires of Jokey's exploding box and decides to boobytrap it with an even bigger boom. (S1, ep 5)

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: Scaredy finds himself turned into a monster in 'The Scariest Smurf', and in 'DRIIINNGGGGG!', Handy builds Lazy a special alarm clock to keep him awake, but it keeps everyone else awake too! (S1, ep 6)

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: Plankton is frustrated that people think he's cute in 'Say Awww!', then in 'Patrick the Mailman', Patrick crushes the mailman, so he and SpongeBob deliver the mail around Bikini Bottom.

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show
programme.desc: The Yard Sale: GrandPat prevents his precious memories from being sold at a family yard sale. (S1, ep 4)

programme.title: Sonic Prime
programme.desc: Situation - Grim: Sonic learns that Nine is using the New Yoke shard to create his dream world in a barren shatterspace called The Grim. Can Sonic convince Nine to fight with him? (S1, ep 6)

programme.title: The Thundermans
programme.desc: Thunder in Paradise - Part 1: The Thundermans are off to Hawaii for summer vacation, but Phoebe has absorbed Dark Mayhem's evil powers, and is all set on world domination. (S4, ep 20)

programme.title: Henry Danger
programme.desc: Thumb Buddies Back: The Thumb Buddies return from space and are intent on getting revenge against Captain Man and Kid Danger. (S4, ep 21)

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs take some nature lessons in 'Back to Nature', then in 'Okey-Dokey!', Jokey has a new prank - giving Grouchy a potion that makes him say okey dokey to every request. (S2, ep 6)

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: Papa Smurf wants to prove that alchemy is more powerful than magic in 'Smurfy Magic Duel', then in 'Doctor Brainy & Mister Dumb', Brainy's new invention backfires and leaves him brainless. (S2, ep 7)

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: SpongeBob learns that imitation is the sincerest form of flattery in 'Mimic Madness', and then in 'House Worming', SpongeBob finds that some unwelcome visitors have moved in.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: Squidward is so tired before a big audition that SpongeBob and Patrick can't wake him up in 'Snooze You Lose', then in 'Krusty Catering', Mr. Krabs and his crew must cater a high-class fancy party.

programme.title: The Loud House
programme.desc: Luna worries that her ambition to be a rocker is unrealistic in 'Roadie to Nowhere', then in 'A Fridge Too Far', when food Lincoln saved in the fridge gets taken, a territory war ensues. (S3, ep 3)

programme.title: The Loud House
programme.desc: Carol Pingrey's photo gets more likes than Lori's in 'Selfie Improvement', and in 'No Place Like Homeschool', Lola is being temporarily homeschooled, and the other kids try to get in on it. (S3, ep 4)

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show
programme.desc: Bunny's mother visits from the old country in 'Which Witch is Which?', and then in 'Get Off My Lawnie', Granny Tentacles gets her own spin-off show. (S1, ep 25)

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: Plankton creates a clone of himself and Mr. Krabs in 'The Krusty Bucket', then in 'Squid's on a Bus', Squidward gleefully switches jobs with a bus driver... until SpongeBob and Patrick climb aboard.

programme.title: The Thundermans
programme.desc: Date of Emergency: Phoebe fakes a romance after feeling left out with her friends all in relationships, but keeping her lie going proves to be harder than she expected. (S4, ep1)

programme.title: Henry Danger
programme.desc: Danger Games - Part 3: When Dr. Minyak plans to ruin Double G's concert, Captain Man and Kid Danger join forces with the Game Shakers to defeat Dr. Minyak and keep Double G safe. (S4, ep 3)

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: Scaredy Smurf would like a dragon in 'I Want a Dragon', then in 'Magic Meltdown', an abandoned cauldron takes revenge. (S3, ep 5)

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Great Smurf Games: The winning team will receive a magical sphere that grants its owner one wish. Clumsy has got his heart set on taking part so that he can win this coveted prize. (S3, ep 6)

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show
programme.desc: Patrick helps with Squidward's paper route in 'Pat-per Route', then in 'Day of the Dartfish', The Dartfish family finds a thief. (S3, ep 6)

programme.title: The Loud House
programme.desc: The Louds are invited to stay in a spooky castle in 'A Bite of Transylvania', then in 'Greece is the Word', during a tour of the Parthenon, Lincoln gets sent back to Ancient Greece. (S8, ep 7)

programme.title: Sonic Prime
programme.desc: It Takes One to No Place: Sonic lands in the deep seas of The No Place, where pirate versions of his friends are led by Knuckled the Dredd. (S1, ep 7)

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: Plankton's computer wife Karen ends up working at the Krusty Krab after being replaced by a newer model in 'Karen 2.0', and in 'InSPONGEiac', SpongeBob can't get to sleep, and asks Patrick to help.

programme.title: The Thundermans: Undercover
programme.desc: Tide and Prejudice: The Thundermans are visited by High Tide, the former protector of Secret Shores. He decides to take back his old role, even if it puts Jinx and Booch in danger. (S1, ep 11)

programme.title: Rock Island Mysteries
programme.desc: New Friends: Taylor is transported to a nightmarish version of Rock Island where she doesn't exist, and her friends don't know her. (S2, ep 8)

programme.title: Henry Danger
programme.desc: Henry's Frittle Problem: When Henry's dad gets an offer for a new job, Henry and Ray go undercover to try and stop Henry's dad from getting the job and prevent Henry from having to move. (S4, ep 15)

programme.title: Henry Danger
programme.desc: Toddler Invasion: When The Toddler takes control of the Man Cave, Charlotte and Jasper have to find a way to sneak into the Man Cave and free Kid Danger and Captain Man. (S4, ep 16)

programme.title: The Thundermans
programme.desc: Doppel-Gamers: Billy and Nora bond with an outgoing pair of teens at a gamer's convention, making Max and Phoebe aware of much they have been neglecting their younger siblings. (S3, ep 8)

programme.title: The Thundermans
programme.desc: Floral Support: Max uses Phoebe to help retrieve his chronicle of evil deeds from the school's confiscation closet, but goes too far in breaking her trust to pull off his plan. (S3, ep 9)

programme.title: Danger Force
programme.desc: Trojan Force: When Danger Force's fingerprints show up on crime scene evidence, they must break into police headquarters and wipe the prints, or their secret identities will be ruined. (S2, ep 25)

programme.title: Victorious
programme.desc: Jade Gets Crushed: Andre is working on a song with Jade, and gets a crush on her. Tori tries to help him get over it, but Andre just can't keep his feelings a secret. (S2, ep 7)

programme.title: Popularity Papers
programme.desc: Livin' on a Dare: Does being a rebel make you popular? When Julie finds a banned game in the Lost & Found, she realizes it's the perfect way for her to become a school rebel. (S1, ep 19)

programme.title: Henry Danger
programme.desc: Stuck In Two Holes: Captain Man and Kid Danger are each stuck in a hole? Charlotte and Jasper had better go help, because Schwoz is taking a bean bath! (S3, ep 17)

programme.title: Henry Danger
programme.desc: Balloons of Doom: When Dr. Minyak takes the Man Fans hostage, Captain Man and Kid Danger have to find a way to rescue them without Dr. Minyak seeing them move. (S3, ep 18)

programme.title: The Thundermans
programme.desc: Thunder in Paradise - Part 1: The Thundermans are off to Hawaii for summer vacation, but Phoebe has absorbed Dark Mayhem's evil powers, and is all set on world domination. (S4, ep 20)

programme.title: The Thundermans
programme.desc: Thunder in Paradise - Part 2: The Thundermans are off to Hawaii for summer vacation, but Phoebe has absorbed Dark Mayhem's evil powers, and is all set on world domination. (S4, ep 21)

programme.title: Rock Island Mysteries
programme.desc: Distress Call: When Taylor and the gang hear a radio distress call coming from themselves, from the future. They race to find the source of the message. Ellis thinks he has time-travelled. (S1, ep 5)

programme.title: Rock Island Mysteries
programme.desc: A Tale of Two Taylors: The gang inadvertently creates a mischievous clone of Taylor! When clone Taylor runs off, it's down to Ellis and Taylor to find how to reverse the cloning process. (S1, ep 6)

programme.title: Sonic Prime
programme.desc: Avoid the Void: In The Void, Shadow intercepts Sonic's latest Shatterspace transverse, for a personal face-to-fist encounter. (S1, ep 9)

programme.desc: Flower Power: A gust of wind sweeps away the flower that Grizzy's adored she-bear wears in her hair. Grizzy sees this as a golden opportunity to dazzle her by bringing it back. (S1 Ep32)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Teleportation's the Way to Go!: Grizzy finds two identical vases in a Native American Indian chest. If he sticks his hand in one, it comes out the other! (S1 Ep33)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Bear Countdown: Grizzy finds a vintage stopwatch in the garage which lets you wind back the minute that has just passed by, and it can even stop time and movement in one's surroundings. (S1 Ep34)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Lemming Airlines: Grizzy is disturbed in the middle of his snack by a strange flow of objects that have been transformed into hot air balloons. (S1 Ep35)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Relax Bear: Grizzy discovers with that the ranger has purchased a new recliner. But even an armchair designed for relaxation can be used for other purposes by the Lemmings! (S1 Ep36)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Manufacturing Secret: Grizzy has run out of chocolate spread. He realises that the Lemmings are making their own. If they can make it, then why can't he? But first, he needs the recipe! (S1 Ep43)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Bling Bling Bear: Inspired by a magazine showing a man offering a diamond to a woman, Grizzy imagines himself offering the ranger's engagement ring to his beloved she-bear. (S1 Ep44)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Intellectual Bear: When he accidentally sticks a computer microprocessor to his head, Grizzy is transformed into a being capable of predicting events to come far in advance. (S1 Ep45)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Voodoo Blanket: The Lemmings prepare a dream afternoon snack with the last jar of chocolate spread in the cupboard. (S1 Ep46)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Bear Prints: Grizzy discovers that he can print images taken with the ranger's camera which is connected to a state-of-the-art printer. (S1 Ep47)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Inspector Grizzy: A van pulls up to the ranger's cabin to deliver a crate of chocolate spread. While Grizzy and the Lemmings fight over a wrecking bar to open it, someone steals the crate. (S1 Ep48)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: No Entrance!: As usual, Grizzy picks the door of the ranger's log cabin to go in and make himself comfortable, but this time it's impossible to enter! (S1 Ep49)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Lemmings Indigestion: The Lemmings have got their hands on a pack of white beans which have very strange properties: when mixed with soda, anyone who eats them turns into a bouncing ball. (S1 Ep50)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Sonata in Bear Major: Grizzy wants to get rid of the old piano in the garage at any cost, for the Lemmings love using it to make a racket. (S1 Ep51)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Bear Fractions: The Lemmings find a crate from an army convoy transporting ultra-secret material that divides objects into multiple miniaturised versions of themselves. (S1 Ep52)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: The Bear that Laid Golden Eggs: Near the supermarket, a machine hands out surprise eggs in exchange for a coin. Amongst the lots to be won, there is a super firework rocket. (S1 Ep53)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Crash Training Course: Grizzy finds a gadget that enables you to learn anything. He can now become the perfect bear! But first, he needs to learn how to get rid of the Lemmings. (S1 Ep54)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: As Far as Bear Can Remember: An old metal box found by chance brings back childhood memories for Grizzy and the Lemmings. They recall the first time they met, when they were still kids. (S1 Ep55)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Chemical Lemmings: How can Grizzy watch a documentary on salmon fish, nice and comfy on the sofa, when the Lemmings are playing chemistry novices with a fun experiment box? (S1 Ep56)

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Remote Control: Grizzy's TV remote control is stolen by a partridge who collects high-tech objects in his nest perched high up in a tree. (S1 Ep57)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Bear Itch: Grizzy discovers that the frenzied dance the lemmings are doing is actually due to the fleas they are infested with. When Grizzy catches them too, it's panic all round! (S1 Ep13)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Thirst Quencher: It's another heatwave and even the riverbed has dried up. A very thirsty Grizzy discovers that the lemmings have used the last of the water to fill their inflatable pool. (S1 Ep14)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Spider Lemmings: The lemmings have caught a spider and her sticky, elastic threads are perfect for bungee jumping, but Grizzy discovers that he has arachnophobia. (S1 Ep15)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Random Bear: Grizzy and the lemmings fight over chocolate-spread jar lids, which they use as chips in a competition to win goodies. (S1 Ep16)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Lemming Interference: Grizzy has prepared himself a TV dinner, but his meal is interrupted by unexplained static. Grizzy finds that the true 'interference' is down to the lemmings. (S1 Ep17)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: High Voltage Bear Attack: The lemmings are having a party, but when Grizzy throws their ghetto blaster into the river he sparks a power cut! (S1 Ep18)

programme.title: Droners
programme.desc: The Arakno Race: The Tikis have been sabotaged! Team Pirate is blamed and black-listed, with Mouse as sole ally...Until Corto discovers the actual culprits. (S1 Ep5)

programme.title: Droners
programme.desc: The Rock 'N' Rolla Coaster Race: Unsettled by the Tao Twin's skills - and by their charming captain, Corto tries to boost Maroro with an ancient Aqua relic... (S1 Ep6)

programme.title: Jade Armor
programme.desc: The Talk: The Crimson Lord uses a Shard-embedded megaphone to steal voices, including L.J.'s. Mute before she's in the suit, Jade plays videos of herself training. (S1 Ep3)

programme.title: Miraculous: Tales of Ladybug...
programme.desc: ...and Cat Noir: Gang Of Secrets: Marinette's friends get akumatized into the Gang of Secrets, a team of supervillains determined to save her... whether she wants it or not! (S4 Ep3)

programme.title: Miraculous: Tales of Ladybug...
programme.desc: ...and Cat Noir: Pigeon 72: Mr. Ramier gets akumatized into M. Pigeon for the 72nd time, and now, he can turn people into evil pigeons! To stop him, Ladybug will have to ruffle his feathers. (S4 Ep4)

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! Sevens
programme.desc: Rock the Rush Duel: Romin loves to play guitar, but duelling doesn't strike her chord. Can Yuga convince Romin that Rush Duel rocks? (S1 Ep3)

programme.title: Monster High
programme.desc: Spell the Beans Part 1: When the Monster Parent Association are sent on a witch hunt, Draculaura has a big decision to make. (S1 Ep25)

programme.title: Monster High
programme.desc: Spell the Beans Part 2: Draculaura partners with her dad to stop the Expel Beast from enacting its wrath on Monster High. (S1 Ep26)

programme.title: Monster High
programme.desc: Monster Movie: Lagoona's ignored by other monsters as they make a movie for the Monster High Film Festival. (S1 Ep27)

programme.title: Monster High
programme.desc: Casketball Jinx: Clawdeen jinxes the casketball team and almost quits, but realizes why the sport is important to her. (S1 Ep28)

programme.title: Miraculous: Tales Of Ladybug & Cat Noir
programme.desc: Glaciator: Ladybug faces Andr the ice-cream maker, now Glaciator. (S2 Ep3)

programme.title: Miraculous: Tales Of Ladybug & Cat Noir
programme.desc: Despair Bear: Ladybug faces Chlo's butler, now Despair Bear. (S2 Ep4)

programme.title: New: Yu-Gi-Oh! Sevens
programme.desc: I'm Curious: Nail unleashes a never-before-seen move against Yuga - Maximum Summon! (S1 Ep23)

programme.title: Dragon Ball Super
programme.desc: Where Does the Dream Go!? Look for Super Saiyan God!: Beerus tries to discover the unbeatable foe from his dream, and Supreme Kai seeks information about Beerus and Goku. (S1 Ep3)

programme.title: Kipo and the Age of Wonderbeasts
programme.desc: Real Cats Wear Plaid: Kipo and our heroes are captured by the Timbercats, a tribe of lumberjack cats who are searching for a sacred Scratching Tree that was stolen from their forest. (S1 Ep3)

programme.title: She-Ra and the Princesses of Power
programme.desc: Razz: While practicing her new powers, Adora accidentally transforms a horse into a winged unicorn... (S1 Ep3)

programme.title: Miraculous: Tales Of...
programme.desc: ...Ladybug & Cat Noir: Lady Wifi: Alya is convinced that Chloe is actually Ladybug, causing all sorts of mischief. Plus, with Hawk Moth around things get very hectic. (S1 Ep3)

programme.title: Miraculous: Tales Of...
programme.desc: ...Ladybug & Cat Noir: Princess Fragrance: Rose, a student who goes to high school with Marinette, gets akumatized by Hawk Moth and starts bewitching everyone with her perfumes. (S1 Ep4)

programme.title: Miraculous: Tales Of Ladybug & Cat Noir
programme.desc: Gamer: Adrien and Max, who have the highest scores on the Ultimate Robot Strike videogame, have to compete together in a major tournament. (S1 Ep12)

programme.title: Miraculous: Tales Of Ladybug & Cat Noir
programme.desc: Animan: As Marinette waits for Adrien at the zoo, the zoo keeper gets akumatized into a panther by Hawk Moth. (S1 Ep13)

programme.title: Monster High
programme.desc: Flaunt Your Skeleton: Ghoulia's dream and nightmare is about to come true when she is set to perform with superstar alum, Debbie Scary. (S1 Ep22)

programme.title: Droners
programme.desc: Race for the Khepri: Motivated to win the race by catching the Khepri, Enki finds a very effective yet dangerous solution that could severely affect team Bee's drone. (S1 Ep22)

programme.title: Droners
programme.desc: Race for a Cure: During a race in the swamp, the genies are victim of a pollen allergy. Whale decides to maintain the race, curious to see what solutions both teams will find. (S1 Ep24)

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Sniffer Sniffler Raccoon: Grizzy's last jar of chocolate spread has been pinched by the Lemmings, who are savouring it in secret. (S1 Ep67)

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Transformational Bear: Grizzy uses the Lemmings' radio-controlled toy robot as a butler. (S1 Ep68)

programme.title: Y Tralalas
programme.desc: Mae'r Tralalas ishe gwybod pa mor hir yw'r afon a lle mae'n darfod. Felly ma nhw'n dilyn yr afon a gweld amryw bethau ar y daith. The Tralalas ponder the river's length and where it ends.

programme.title: Sam Tn
programme.desc: Mae Sam ac Arnold yn camu i'r adwy i achub y dydd pan mae Norman a Mandy yn herwgipio ceffyl! Sam and Arnold have to save the day when Norman and Mandy kidnap a horse!

programme.title: Cacamwnci
programme.desc: Cyfres gomedi i blant meithrin sy'n cynnwys sgetsys, eitemau doniol, jcs a chymeriadau dwl newydd sbon. A comedy show for pre-school children, full of sketches, jokes and fun!

programme.title: Sion y Chef
programme.desc: Mae Sion yn ceisio torri record y byd am y frechdan fwya' erioed. Tybed a lwyddith? Sin tries to break the world record for the biggest sandwich ever made. Does he succeed?

programme.title: Asra
programme.desc: Bydd plant o Ysgol I.D. Hooson, Rhosllannerchrugog yn ymweld ag Asra yr wythnos hon. Children from Ysgol I.D. Hooson, Rhosllannerchrugog visit Asra this week.

programme.title: Caru Canu
programme.desc: Cyfres animeiddiedig gyda chaneuon a hwiangerddi traddodiadol a chyfoes. Y tro hwn: cn hwyliog, draddodiadol am anifeiliaid. This time: a traditional, joyful song introducing animals.

programme.title: Digbi Draig
programme.desc: Mae Cochyn a Betsi yn helpu Digbi i lanhau ei ogof. A fydd swyn yn helpu? Cochyn and Betsi are helping Digbi clean his cave. Will a little magic help?

programme.title: Bendibwmbwls
programme.desc: Cyfres gomedi, celf a chn i blant 4-7 mlwydd oed lle mae Aeron Pugh fel y cymeriad Bendant yn ymuno dosbarthiadau plant ledled Cymru. Comedy, art and singing series for children aged 4-7.

programme.title: Guto Gwningen
programme.desc: Wedi i Guto, Benja a Lili gael eu hudo gan lwyth o radish blasus yr olwg, mae Lili'n cael ei dal yn nhrap Mr Cadno. Lili finds herself caught in Mr Cadno's trap. Can Guto rescue her?

programme.title: Dal Dy Ddannedd
programme.desc: Timau o Ysgol Cwm Gwyddon sy'n ymuno Pwdryn a Melys i chwarae llond trol o gemau lliwgar! Teams from Ysgol Cwm Gwyddon join Pwdryn and Melys to play a series of candyland themed games.

programme.title: Cywion Bach
programme.desc: Dere ar antur geiriau gyda Bp Bp, Pi Po, Bop a Bw a'r criw ledled Cymru wrth iddynt ddysgu sut i ddweud ac arwyddo'r gair 'sanau'. The friends learn how to say and sign the word 'sanau'.

programme.title: Og y Draenog Hapus
programme.desc: Beth sy'n digwydd ym myd Og a'i ffrindiau heddiw? What's happening in the world of Og and friends today?

programme.title: Deian a Loli

programme.title: Octonots

programme.title: Fferm Fach

programme.title: Ein Byd Bach

programme.title: Patrl Pawennau

programme.title: Y Tralalas

programme.title: Cymylaubychain

programme.title: Supermarket Secrets Revealed
programme.desc: 2/8. Stefan examines the differing conditions under which hens lay eggs. Sian asks how effective at probiotic drinks really are. Own-brand cereals vs. the best-known brands.

programme.title: Sex Actually with Alice Levine
programme.desc: From Bournemouth to Dundee, Alice meets 'cam' couples who are monetising their sex lives by retailing 'authentic sex' online. Contains scenes of a sexual nature, nudity and strong language.

programme.title: Mary Millington: Come Play With Me
programme.desc: Two hapless forgers hide out in a Scottish manor house. When a troupe of dancing girls join them musical numbers, comedy and sauce ensues. Contains sexual scenes.

programme.title: Let's Get Laid
programme.desc: Gordon Laid is a soldier returning to London after WW2. He gets mixed up in a series of murders and mistaken identities. Bawdy romp with Robin Askwith. Contains nudity and 70s social attitudes.
